TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000MMwC1:ref

Hi Team,

we just wanted to be sure and able, to control and monitor logs from OS.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #437211 - Root access

TextBody:
Hi Kamil,

The SSH access to the EPP server is restricted to the EPP Support team only.
 
We do not provide SSH access to customers both to protect Netwrix's intellectual property and to avoid changes being made to the backend that would affect the server's functionality.
 
In order to administrate the product, SSH access is not needed, everything the admin needs can be performed in the User Interface.
 
In case a problem that requires SSH access appears, customers need to open a support ticket and our Support Team will take over and troubleshoot.   

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000MMwC1:ref

Hi Team, 

we are just checking the possibility to have access to EPP logs in our new SIEM (including any root action).
Any suggestion how to do it?

Thanks

Kamil B
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #437211 - Root access

TextBody:
Hi Kamil,

We do offer the option to forward logs to a SIEM solution. Please follow these steps:


	Navigate to Appliance -> SIEM Integration.
	Click on the Add New button.
	Fill in the server details and select the log types(including "Admin Actions" - root actions) you want to forward.


If you need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.
Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com
